testcase.system-out: @scenario.begin @Test_Create_Campaign_Send_Schedule_Options_SMS_Shortlinks_5 @Test_Create_Campaign_Send_Schedule_Options_SMS_Shortlinks scenario: Create campaign with schedule option (warning percentage 100%) given I am on the campaign settings page "Shortlink" in "SMS" ... passed in 23.08s e given I select a company, and a name for the test "PRUEBAS AUTOMATIZADAS" ... passed in 4.061s when I select Send now/schedule option "2" ... passed in 1.305s when I enter a percentage "100" in the phase ... passed in 1.197s when I click the add phase ... passed in 1.28s then I see the error message "Please, check the percentages assigned to each phase; the total amount must be 100%" in "(//div[@class='ant-notification-notice-description'])[1]" ... passed in 2.091s @scenario.end ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Create_Campaign_With_Schedule_Option_(Error_Date_)
testcase.system-out: @scenario.begin @Test_Create_Campaign_Send_Schedule_Options_SMS_Shortlinks_6 @Test_Create_Campaign_Send_Schedule_Options_SMS_Shortlinks scenario: Create campaign with schedule option (error date ) given I am on the campaign settings page "Shortlink" in "SMS" ... passed in 22.81s e given I select a company, and a name for the test "PRUEBAS AUTOMATIZADAS" ... passed in 3.989s when I select Send now/schedule option "2" ... passed in 1.336s when I enter a percentage "100" in the phase ... passed in 1.21s when I enter the today date in the phase ... passed in 1.634s when I click on the "next" button to continue ... passed in 3.327s then I see the error message "All the phases should have a configured date" in "(//div[@class='ant-notification-notice-description'])[1]" ... passed in 2.079s @scenario.end ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Create_Campaign_With_Schedule_Option
testcase.system-out: @scenario.begin @Test_Create_Campaign_Send_Schedule_Options_SMS_Shortlinks_7 @Test_Create_Campaign_Send_Schedule_Options_SMS_Shortlinks scenario: Create campaign with schedule option given I am on the campaign settings page "Shortlink" in "SMS" ... passed in 23.17s e given I select a company, and a name for the test "PRUEBAS AUTOMATIZADAS" ... passed in 3.997s when I select Send now/schedule option "2" ... passed in 1.285s when I enter a percentage "50" in the phase ... passed in 1.182s when I enter the "today" date in the phase ... passed in 1.725s when I enter the "now" hour ... passed in 1.514s when I click the add phase ... passed in 1.304s when I enter a percentage "50" in the phase ... passed in 1.235s when I enter the "tomorrow" date in the phase ... passed in 1.549s when I enter the "tomorrow" hour ... passed in 1.537s when I click on the "next" button to continue ... passed in 3.336s then I am redirected to the destination creation page ... passed in 2.062s @scenario.end ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
